firebolt-credentials.name: Firebolt Credentials
firebolt-credentials.description: Store credentials for authenticating with Firebolt.
firebolt-credentials.code_example:
```python
from prefect_firebolt.credentials import FireboltCredentials

firebolt_credentials_block = FireboltCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: FireboltCredentials
fields.description: Store credentials for authenticating with Firebolt.

username.title: Username
username.description: The email address associated with your Firebolt user.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used for connecting to Firebolt.

token.title: Token
token.description: Authentication token to use instead of username and password.

api_endpoint.title: API Endpoint
api_endpoint.description: Firebolt API endpoint used for authentication.

account_name.title: Account Name
account_name.description: Name of the account to authenticate with. If not provided, the default account will be used.

firebolt-database.name: Firebolt Database
firebolt-database.code_example:
```python
from prefect_firebolt.database import FireboltDatabase

firebolt_database_block = FireboltDatabase.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

database.title: Database Name
database.description: The name of the database to connect to.

engine_name.title: Engine Name
engine_name.description: Name of the engine to connect to. May not be used with engine_url. If neither engine_name nor engine_url is provided, the default engine for the configured database will be used.

engine_url.title: Engine URL
engine_url.description: The engine endpoint to use. May not be used with engine_name. If neither engine_name nor engine_url is provided, the default engine for the configured database will be used.

additional_parameters.title: Additional Parameters
additional_parameters.description: Additional configuration to pass to the Firebolt connection.
